short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any content to a audio book . Listen ,Store, Bookmark any content on web as a audio read .

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to any text content available on web. Control text like like music. With Support for multiple languages.

* Add content to the your reads listing .
* Control over audio functionality .
* View audio content sync real time .
* Control text read like music with features to go backward and forward.
